title: meta Shortcodes for Precise Includes
text:
This is an example site to showcase the use of meta shortcodes for more precise includes using Quarto.
Features showcased:

meta
includes

title: New York
text:
New York covers approximately 54,555 making it the 27th largest state in the United States. As of 2023, New York has an approximate population of about 19.8 million.
New York’s official flower is the Rose, pictured below:



The official New York state flower, the Rose


Lastly, New York’s official animal is the Beaver, pictured below:



The official New York state animal, the Beaver

title: Pennsylvania
text:
Pennsylvania covers approximately 46,055 making it the 33rd largest state in the United States. As of 2023, Pennsylvania has an approximate population of about 12.9 million.
Pennsylvania’s official flower is the Mountain Laurel, pictured below:



The official Pennsylvania state flower, the Mountain Laurel


Lastly, Pennsylvania’s official animal is the White-tailed Deer, pictured below:



The official Pennsylvania state animal, the White-tailed Deer
